content: We have implementers who are acting as servers participating in scenarios where they have implemented a specific operation. How can we document that they tested the scenario against a certain reference client and it passed. I see the clients tab has a "Track / Scenario / Role (from Testing)" column but I can't see where that information would be entered.
Right now, then should be entered in the notes when you add a result.
I used to have a way to add a client specifically, but the UI was quite klunky so as part of simplifying things I took it out. Maybe it was over simplified?

For us in particular, we have implementers acting as clients and others as server and we're trying to keep track of who has tested against who. I couldn't make ConMan work for this so we're using Confluence with a big giant set of tables https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/SMART+Health+Cards+links+and+tools.

Oh, I'm sorry that that was a feature you would have used! I can add it back for next time, but now would be a bit hard - and you've already got an alternative that's working for you right now anyway...
